revision.text: As you earn achievements, you gain up to 100% (per region) (and 50% for Sevii Islands) more [[Poké Dollar|Money]], [[Dungeon Tokens]] and Experience from all sources. Your [[Pokémon Statistics#Click Attack|Click Attack]] is also boosted by the achievement percentage. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 150% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
